title: Welcome to Terra Dotta, UConn Experiential Global Learning's online database!
cleaned_text: online database! We're excited to help navigate you through the greatest adventure of your college experience! You may use the gray bar above to log in (the link at the far right) or go to your applicant home page (the house icon at the far left). If you have any questions on how to use this database, please contact UConn Experiential Global Learning at 860-486-5022 or
